hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Allah has ninety-nine names, i.e. one-hundred minus one, and whoever knows them will go to Paradise." (Please see Hadith No. 419 Vol)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَجُوزُ مِنَ الاِشْتِرَاطِ وَالثُّنْيَا فِي الإِقْرَارِ
chapter.eng-name: What kinds of conditions are permissible; and what is exempted from the decision
